name: Deadly Deliever
description:
Covala virus is all over the news. But I still have one more order to deliver! I must find alcohol to clean off all the virus that’s in the restaurant. When I goes for the delivery, I also need a mask to protect myself. Finally, I’m at the front door of the customer’s building, but when I was asking for the password for the door, the phone’s signal got cut off, I only heard 2 numbers, I needs to figure out the last two numbers to deliver the food to the customer.

Programmer: Jiajia Dong

2D Artist: HangZheng

3D Artist: Jiaming Du,  Haobin Liang
